search.footer: Type # for rooms, @ for DMs and * for spaces. Hotkey: Ctrl + k

joinAlias.title: Join with address
joinAlias.unableToFind: Unable to find room/space with {alias}. Either room/space is private or doesn't exist.
joinAlias.unableToJoin: Unable to join {alias}. Either room/space is private or doesn't exist.

profileViewer.sharedPowerMessage: You will not be able to undo this change as you are promoting the user to have the same power level as yourself. Are you sure?
profileViewer.demotingMyselfMessage: You will not be able to undo this change as you are demoting yourself. Are you sure?

createRoom.encryptionDescription: You can't disable this later. Bridges & most bots won't work yet.
createRoom.roleDescription: Selecting Admin sets 100 power level whereas Founder sets 101.

errors.serverNotAllowed: Login with custom server not allowed by your client instance.
errors.invalidServer: Failed to find your Matrix ID server.
errors.invalidRequest: Failed to login. Part of your request data is invalid.
errors.rateLimited: Failed to login. Your login request has been rate-limited by server, Please try after some time.
errors.homeserverConfigUnusable: Failed to connect. Homeserver configuration found with {host} appears unusable.
errors.homeserverConfigInvalid: Failed to connect. Homeserver configuration base_url appears invalid.
errors.homeserverUnavailable: Failed to connect. Either homeserver is unavailable at this moment or does not exist.
errors.failedToGetAuthFlow: Failed to get authentication flow information.

editor.title: Editor
editor.enterForNewlineDescription: Use {key} + ENTER to send message and ENTER for newline.

unverified.title: Unverified

export.title: Export Messages Data
export.description: Save password protected copy of encryption data on your device to decrypt messages later.

import.title: Import Messages Data
import.description: Load password protected copy of encryption data from device to decrypt your messages.

clearCache.description: Clear all cached data and reload the app.
